briefdescription.para: Creates a new QgsColorEffect effect from a properties string map.
Returns the blend mode for the effect.

simplesect.para: blend mode used for drawing the effect on to a destination paint device

briefdescription.para: Returns the brightness modification for the effect.

simplesect.para: brightness value. Values are between -255 and 255, where 0 represents no change, negative values indicate darkening and positive values indicate lightening

briefdescription.para: Duplicates an effect by creating a deep copy of the effect.
Returns the color used for colorizing a picture.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if colorizeOn() is set to true.
colorization color
setColorizeColor
colorizeOn
colorizeStrength

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the effect will colorize a picture.
Returns the strength used for colorizing a picture.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if setColorizeOn() is set to true.
colorization strength, between 0 and 100
setColorizeStrength
colorizeOn
colorizeColor

briefdescription.para: Returns the contrast modification for the effect.

simplesect.para: contrast value. Values are between -100 and 100, where 0 represents no change, negative values indicate less contrast and positive values indicate greater contrast

briefdescription.para: Returns whether the effect will convert a picture to grayscale.
Returns the opacity for the effect.

simplesect.para: opacity value between 0 and 1 inclusive, where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque.

briefdescription.para: Returns the properties describing the paint effect encoded in a string format.

simplesect.para: string map of properties, in the form property key, value

briefdescription.para: Reads a string map of an effect's properties and restores the effect to the state described by the properties map.

parameterdescription.para: effect properties encoded in a string map

briefdescription.para: Returns the saturation modification for the effect.

simplesect.para: saturation value. Values are between 0 and 2.0, where 1.0 represents no change, 0.0 represents totally desaturated (grayscale), and positive values indicate greater saturation

briefdescription.para: Sets the blend mode for the effect.

parameterdescription.para: blend mode used for drawing the effect on to a destination paint device

briefdescription.para: Sets the brightness modification for the effect.

parameterdescription.para: Valid values are between -255 and 255, where 0 represents no change, negative values indicate darkening and positive values indicate lightening

briefdescription.para: Sets the color used for colorizing a picture.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if setColorizeOn() is set to true.
colorizeColor
colorization color
colorizeColor
setColorizeOn
setColorizeStrength

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the effect should colorize a picture.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to enable colorization

briefdescription.para: Sets the strength for colorizing a picture.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if setColorizeOn() is set to true.
colorizeStrength
colorization strength, between 0 and 100
colorizeStrength
setColorizeOn
setColorizeColor

briefdescription.para: Sets the contrast modification for the effect.

parameterdescription.para: Valid values are between -100 and 100, where 0 represents no change, negative values indicate less contrast and positive values indicate greater contrast

briefdescription.para: Sets whether the effect should convert a picture to grayscale.
Sets the opacity for the effect.

parameterdescription.para: double between 0 and 1 inclusive, where 0 is fully transparent and 1 is fully opaque

briefdescription.para: Sets the saturation modification for the effect.

parameterdescription.para: Valid values are between 0 and 2.0, where 1.0 represents no change, 0.0 represents totally desaturated (grayscale), and positive values indicate greater saturation

briefdescription.para: Returns the effect type.

simplesect.para: unique string representation of the effect type

briefdescription.para: Handles drawing of the effect's result on to the specified render context.

detaileddescription.para:
Derived classes must reimplement this method to apply any transformations to the source QPicture and draw the result using the context's painter.
context
destination render context
drawSource

briefdescription.para: A paint effect which alters the colors (e.g., brightness, contrast) in a source picture.
